update FUN_DEAL set AREA_ID = #{pMap.areaId}, REG_ID = #{pMap.regId} where COMP_ID = #{pMap.compId} and DEPT_ID= #{pMap.deptId}
mapper.select: order by ${param.orderBy} OFFSET ${param.offsetNow} ROW FETCH NEXT ${param.pageRows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT top 50 a.* from FUN_DEAL a left join DEAL_TRACK b on b.DEAL_ID=a.DEAL_ID where b.DEAL_ID is null AND a.DEAL_ID < #{dealId} AND a.SIGN_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by a.DEAL_ID desc

SET DATEFIRST 1; SELECT
(${param.signDateColumnB}) AS dateCount,
CONCAT(C.REG_ID) CONCAT(C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID) CONCAT(C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID,'_',C.USER_ID)
C.AREA_ID CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID) CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID) CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID,'_',C.USER_ID)
as range, SUM (iif(B.SIGN_USER_ID > 0,1,0)) AS signCount FROM FUN_DEAL B LEFT JOIN DEAL_USER_RELATIVE C ON B.DEAL_ID = C.DEAL_ID AND B.SIGN_USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND B.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3 AND C.RELATE_TYPE = 3 WHERE B.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND USER_ID = #{param.userId} AND B.SIGN_DATE >= #{param.startTime} AND B.SIGN_DATE <= #{param.endTime} AND B.DEAL_ID > 0
AND B.DEAL_TYPE = #{param.caseType}
AND C.${param.serchRange}_ID = #{param.serchRangeId}
AND C.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
GROUP BY
(${param.signDateColumnB}),
CONCAT(C.REG_ID) CONCAT(C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID) CONCAT(C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID,'_',C.USER_ID)
C.AREA_ID CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID) CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID) CONCAT(C.AREA_ID,'_',C.REG_ID,'_',C.DEPT_ID,'_',C.GR_ID,'_',C.USER_ID)

SET DATEFIRST 1; SELECT
(${param.dateColumnA}) AS dateCount,
CONCAT(A.REG_ID) CONCAT(A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID) CONCAT(A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID,'_',A.USER_ID)
A.AREA_ID CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID) CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID) CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID,'_',A.USER_ID)
as range, COUNT (1) AS signCount FROM HOUSE_INNERDEAL_ANALYSIS A WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.DEAL_ID IS NULL AND A.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
AND A.${param.serchRange}_ID = #{param.serchRangeId}
AND A.CASE_TYPE = 1
AND A.CASE_TYPE = 2
AND A.CREATE_TIME >= #{param.startTime} AND A.CREATE_TIME <= #{param.endTime} GROUP BY
(${param.dateColumnA}),
CONCAT(A.REG_ID) CONCAT(A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID) CONCAT(A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID,'_',A.USER_ID)
A.AREA_ID CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID) CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID) CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID) CONCAT(A.AREA_ID,'_',A.REG_ID,'_',A.DEPT_ID,'_',A.GR_ID,'_',A.USER_ID)

select distinct A.*,D.DEPT_ID as ADMIN_DEPT_ID,C.COMP_ID as ADMIN_COMP_ID,C.COMP_NAME,C.AREA_FLAG from FUN_DEAL A join FUN_DEPTS B on A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID left join hft_admindb.dbo.FUN_DEPTS D ON B.COMP_NO = D.COMP_NO and B.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO join hft_admindb.dbo.FUN_COMP C on D.COMP_NO = C.COMP_NO left join hft_admindb.dbo.BULLET E ON A.DEAL_ID =E.DEAL_ID and E.CITY_ID=${shardCityId} AND E.BULLET_BOUND=8 where A.ISBYHAND = 0 and C.CITY_ID = #{shardCityId} and E.DEAL_ID is null AND A.COMP_ID = 20249 and A.CREATOR_DATE >='2017-12-04'

SELECT ISNULL(SUM(TOTAL_REAL_INCOME), 0) jsAmount FROM fun_deal WHERE DEAL_STATUS = 2 AND DEAL_ID in #{dealId}

select ${param.queryStr}, sum(iif(a.DEAL_STATUS = 2 AND b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 1,b.${param.moneyFieldName},0)) as TRANSFER_DEAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 1,b.${param.moneyFieldName},0)) as TRANSFER_TOTAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(a.DEAL_STATUS = 2 AND b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2,b.${param.moneyFieldName} ,0)) as SECONDHAND_DEAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2,b.${param.moneyFieldName} ,0)) as SECONDHAND_TOTAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(a.DEAL_STATUS = 2 AND b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3,b.${param.moneyFieldName} ,0)) as NEWHOUSE_DEAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3,b.${param.moneyFieldName},0)) as NEWHOUSE_TOTAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(a.DEAL_STATUS = 2 AND b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4,b.${param.moneyFieldName} ,0)) as LEASE_DEAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4,b.${param.moneyFieldName},0)) as LEASE_TOTAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(a.DEAL_STATUS = 2 AND b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 5,b.${param.moneyFieldName},0)) as FINANCE_DEAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 5,b.${param.moneyFieldName} ,0)) as FINANCE_TOTAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.${param.moneyFieldName} ,0)) as TOTAL_PROFIT, sum(iif(a.DEAL_STATUS = 2 AND b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.${param.moneyFieldName} ,0)) as DEAL_TOTAL_PROFIT from fun_deal a join FUN_PROFIT b on b.deal_id=a.deal_id where a.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and a.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} and a.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} and a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.${param.serchRange} in (#{param.serchRangeId})
GROUP BY ${param.groupBy} having sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.${param.moneyFieldName},0)) > 0

with t_profit as(select b.COMP_ID,b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID,b.DEPT_ID,b.GR_ID,b.USER_ID,b.ARCHIVE_ID,b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE,b.DEAL_ID from fun_profit b where b.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and b.USER_ID > 0
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.${param.serchRange} in (#{param.serchRangeId})
group by b.COMP_ID,b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID,b.DEPT_ID,b.GR_ID,b.USER_ID,b.ARCHIVE_ID,b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE,b.DEAL_ID ) select ${param.queryStr},
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as SECONDHAND_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as NEWHOUSE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as LEASE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as TOTAL_DEAL_COUNT from FUN_DEAL a join t_profit b ON a.DEAL_ID = b.DEAL_ID where a.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and a.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} and a.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} and a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.${param.serchRange} in (#{param.serchRangeId})
GROUP BY ${param.groupBy} HAVING sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0))>0
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as SECONDHAND_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as NEWHOUSE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as LEASE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.user_id,1,0)) as TOTAL_DEAL_COUNT from FUN_DEAL a join t_profit b ON a.DEAL_ID = b.DEAL_ID where a.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and a.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} and a.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} and a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.${param.serchRange} in (#{param.serchRangeId})
GROUP BY ${param.groupBy} HAVING sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.user_id,1,0))>0

with t_profit as(select ${param.queryStr},b.ARCHIVE_ID,b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE,b.DEAL_ID from fun_profit b where b.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and b.USER_ID > 0
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.ORGANIZATION_PATH like '%:${param.organizationId}:%'
AND ${param.rangeColumn} IS NOT NULL
group by ${param.groupBy},b.ARCHIVE_ID,b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE,b.DEAL_ID ) select ${param.queryStr},
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as SECONDHAND_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as NEWHOUSE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as LEASE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as TOTAL_DEAL_COUNT from FUN_DEAL a join t_profit b ON a.DEAL_ID = b.DEAL_ID where a.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and a.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} and a.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} and a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.ORGANIZATION_PATH like '%:${param.organizationId}:%'
AND ${param.rangeColumn} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY ${param.groupBy} HAVING sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0))>0
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as SECONDHAND_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as NEWHOUSE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as LEASE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.user_id,1,0)) as TOTAL_DEAL_COUNT from FUN_DEAL a join t_profit b ON a.DEAL_ID = b.DEAL_ID where a.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and a.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} and a.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} and a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.ORGANIZATION_PATH like '%:${param.organizationId}:%'
AND ${param.rangeColumn} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY ${param.groupBy} HAVING sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0))>0

with t_profit as(select ${param.queryStr},b.ARCHIVE_ID,b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE,b.DEAL_ID from fun_profit b where b.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and b.USER_ID > 0
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.ORGANIZATION_PATH like '%:${param.organizationId}:%'
AND ${param.rangeColumn} IS NOT NULL
group by ${param.groupBy},b.ARCHIVE_ID,b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE,b.DEAL_ID ) select ${param.queryStr},
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as SECONDHAND_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as NEWHOUSE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4 and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as LEASE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0)) as TOTAL_DEAL_COUNT from FUN_DEAL a join t_profit b ON a.DEAL_ID = b.DEAL_ID where a.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and a.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} and a.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} and a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.ORGANIZATION_PATH like '%:${param.organizationId}:%'
AND ${param.rangeColumn} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY ${param.groupBy} HAVING sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0))>0
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as SECONDHAND_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as NEWHOUSE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4 and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.USER_ID,1,0)) as LEASE_DEAL_COUNT, sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ID = b.user_id,1,0)) as TOTAL_DEAL_COUNT from FUN_DEAL a join t_profit b ON a.DEAL_ID = b.DEAL_ID where a.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and a.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} and a.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} and a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3
and b.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
and b.ORGANIZATION_PATH like '%:${param.organizationId}:%'
AND ${param.rangeColumn} IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY ${param.groupBy} HAVING sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE in(2,3,4) and a.SIGN_USER_ARCHIVE = b.ARCHIVE_ID,1,0))>0

SELECT ${param.targeQueryStr},SUM(TARGET_PROFIT) as TARGET_PROFIT FROM FUN_PROFIT_TARGET WHERE COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND ${param.serchRange} in (#{param.serchRangeId}) AND TARGET_DATE >= #{param.startTime} AND TARGET_DATE <= #{param.endTime} AND PROFIT_TYPE = #{param.profitType} GROUP BY ${param.targeGroupBy} having SUM(TARGET_PROFIT)>0
SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR SEQ_FUN_DEAL_DEAL_ID
select sum(iif(PF_ACTUAL=0,PAY_AMOUNT,0)) from PROCESS_FINANC where DEAL_ID = #{dealId}

A.SELL_ADDRESS,A.FINANC_NAME,A.CATEGORY_ID,A.CATEGORY_NAME,A.DEAL_BUY_STYLE,A.DEAL_SELL_STYLE,A.DEAL_VERIFY_TIME, A.NEED_ADUIT_STATUS,A.REAL_ADUIT_STATUS,A.BUY_CUSTOMER_PHONE,A.SELL_OWNER_PHONE,A.RENT_PAY_METHOD,A.COMMERCIAL_LOAN_MONEY, A.PROVIDENT_LOAN_MONEY,A.COMMERCIAL_LOAN_DATE,A.COMMERCIAL_LENDER_DATE,A.COMMERCIAL_LENDER_LIMIT,A.COMMERCIAL_LENDER_BANK, A.SIGN_SITE_DEPT,A.SIGN_SITE_GR,A.INTRODUCER_ID,A.ADULT_PROMOTION_ID from FUN_DEAL A where A.COMP_ID = #{compId} AND A.DEAL_ID = #{dealId} order by A.UPDATE_TIME DESC

select DEAL_TYPE,DEAL_ID,CONTRACT_NO,CONTRACT_ID,YOU_ADUIT_STATUS,FINANC_NAME,YOU_ADUIT_OPINION,DEAL_AUDITOR,COMP_ID,MODEL_ID,MODEL_NAME,PAYTYPE_ID,SIGN_USER_DEPT_ID, DEAL_VERIFY_TIME,DEPT_ID,COMMISSION_RATE,SELL_DEAL_MONEY,RENT_DEAL_MONEY,RENT_PRICE_UNIT,DEAL_USER_ID,FINANC_STATUS_ID,DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS,DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS_BEFORE,DEAL_HOUSE_ID,DEAL_BUY_STYLE, DEAL_SELL_STYLE, BUILD_ID,BUILD_NAME,BUY_OWNER_NAME,SELL_OWNER_NAME,AREA,SELL_ADDRESS from FUN_DEAL where DEAL_ID =#{dealId}

UPDATE FUN_DEAL SET DEAL_USER_NAME = CREATOR_NAME, DEAL_USER_ID = CREATOR_UID, UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE() WHERE COMP_ID=#{compId} AND DEAL_ID = #{dealId}

UPDATE FUN_DEAL SET COMMERCIAL_LENDER_BANK=NULL,COMMERCIAL_LENDER_DATE=NULL,COMMERCIAL_LENDER_LIMIT=NULL, COMMERCIAL_LOAN_DATE=NULL,DEAL_USER_ID=NULL,DEAL_USER_NAME=NULL,EVIDENCE_DATE=NULL,PROVIDENT_LENDER_BANK=NULL, PROVIDENT_LENDER_DATE=NULL,PROVIDENT_LENDER_LIMIT=NULL,PROVIDENT_LOAN_DATE=NULL,TRANSFER_DATE=NULL, RUNSTEP_ID=NULL,RUNSTEP_NAME=NULL WHERE DEAL_ID = #{dealId}

FINANC_STATUS_ID = #{param.financStatusId},

LEASE_REAL_PERFORMANCE = #{param.leaseRealPerformance},

TOTAL_REAL_PERFORMANCE = #{param.totalRealPerformance},

where DEAL_ID = #{dealId}

mapper.select:
select
b.COMP_ID,b.AREA_ID,CONCAT(b.AREA_ID,'','') AS RANGE,
b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID,CONCAT(b.AREA_ID,'_',b.REG_ID,'') AS RANGE,
b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID,b.DEPT_ID,CONCAT(b.AREA_ID,'_',b.REG_ID,'_',b.DEPT_ID) AS RANGE,
b.COMP_ID,b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID,b.DEPT_ID,b.GR_ID,CONCAT(b.DEPT_ID,'_',b.GR_ID) AS DEPT_GR,
b.COMP_ID,b.DEPT_ID,b.USER_ID,b.USER_ID AS RANGE,
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.PROFIT_MONEY,0)) as DEAL_TOTAL_PROFIT
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.RECEIVABLE_MONEY,0)) as DEAL_TOTAL_PROFIT
from fun_deal a join FUN_PROFIT b on b.deal_id=a.deal_id where a.COMP_ID = #{compId} AND a.SIGN_DATE >= #{startTime} AND a.SIGN_DATE <= #{endTime} AND a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != '3'
AND b.AREA_ID AND b.REG_ID AND b.DEPT_ID
in
#{rangeId}
AND b.USER_ID IN
#{rangeId}
and b.DEPT_ID=#{selfDeptId}
GROUP BY
b.COMP_ID,b.AREA_ID
b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID
b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID,b.DEPT_ID
b.COMP_ID,b.AREA_ID,b.REG_ID,b.DEPT_ID,b.GR_ID
b.COMP_ID,b.DEPT_ID,b.USER_ID
having sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.RECEIVABLE_MONEY,0))>0 ORDER BY DEAL_TOTAL_PROFIT DESC

select (case when ${groupByColumn} is null then 0 else ${groupByColumn} end) as rangeId,
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.PROFIT_MONEY,0)) as num
sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.RECEIVABLE_MONEY,0)) as num
from fun_deal a join FUN_PROFIT b on b.deal_id=a.deal_id where a.COMP_ID = #{compId} AND a.SIGN_DATE >= #{startTime} AND a.SIGN_DATE <= #{endTime} AND a.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != '3'
AND ${whereCause}
GROUP BY ${groupByColumn} having sum(iif(b.PERFORMANCE_TYPE > 0,b.RECEIVABLE_MONEY,0))>0 order by rangeId

choose.when: (CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),iif (CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),A.${param.dateType},120) >= '${param.startTime}' AND CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),A.${param.dateType},120) <=DATEADD( WEEK,1,DATEADD(DAY, 1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, '${param.startTime}' )-1,'${param.startTime}' )),'${param.startTime}' ,DATEADD( WEEKDAY,1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, A.${param.dateType}), A.${param.dateType})),120) + '-' + iif (CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),A.${param.dateType},120) >= CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),DATEADD( WEEKDAY,1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, '${param.endTime}' ),'${param.endTime}' ),120),CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),'${param.endTime}',120) ,CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),DATEADD(WEEK,1,DATEADD(DAY,1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, A.${param.dateType})-1,A.${param.dateType} )),120)))

mapper.select: SELECT as date , ISNULL(COUNT(1),0) data from FUN_DEAL A JOIN DEAL_USER_RELATIVE B ON A.DEAL_ID = B.DEAL_ID AND A.SIGN_USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.RELATE_TYPE = 3 LEFT JOIN FUN_SALE C ON A.DEAL_HOUSE_ID = C.SALE_ID WHERE A.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3 AND A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} AND A.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} AND A.DEAL_TYPE = 101 GROUP BY

SELECT as date , ISNULL(COUNT(1),0) data from FUN_DEAL A JOIN DEAL_USER_RELATIVE B ON A.DEAL_ID = B.DEAL_ID AND A.SIGN_USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.RELATE_TYPE = 3 LEFT JOIN FUN_LEASE C ON A.DEAL_HOUSE_ID = C.LEASE_ID WHERE A.DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS != 3 AND A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.${param.dateType} >= #{param.startTime} AND A.${param.dateType} <= #{param.endTime} AND A.DEAL_TYPE = 102 GROUP BY

mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
SIGN_SITE_DEPT signSiteDept
SIGN_SITE_GR signSiteGr
FROM FUN_DEAL WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND DEAL_AUDIT_STATUS IN (0,1,2,4,5,6,7,8,9)
AND SIGN_SITE_DEPT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SIGN_SITE_DEPT
AND SIGN_SITE_GR IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SIGN_SITE_GR

SELECT A.SIGN_SITE_DEPT signSiteDept,
A.SIGN_SITE_GR signSiteGr,
SUM(IIF(B.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 1,B.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) realTransfer, SUM(IIF(B.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 2,B.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) realSell, SUM(IIF(B.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 3,B.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) realNewhouse, SUM(IIF(B.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 4,B.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) realLease, SUM(IIF(B.PERFORMANCE_TYPE = 5,B.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) realFinance, SUM(IIF(B.PERFORMANCE_TYPE NOT IN(1,2,3,4,5),B.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) realOther, SUM(IIF(B.PAY_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL,B.PAY_AMOUNT,0)) realSum FROM FUN_DEAL A LEFT JOIN PROCESS_FINANC B ON B.COMP_ID = A.COMP_ID AND B.DEAL_ID = A.DEAL_ID WHERE A.SIGN_DATE BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND B.PF_ACTUAL = 1 AND B.AUDIT_STATUS = 1
AND A.SIGN_SITE_DEPT IN
#{id} AND SIGN_SITE_GR IS NULL GROUP BY SIGN_SITE_DEPT ORDER BY SIGN_SITE_DEPT
AND A.SIGN_SITE_GR IN
#{id}
GROUP BY SIGN_SITE_GR,SIGN_SITE_DEPT ORDER BY SIGN_SITE_GR

SELECT
A.SIGN_SITE_DEPT signSiteDept,
A.SIGN_SITE_GR signSiteGr,
A.DEAL_TYPE dealType,COUNT(DISTINCT A.DEAL_ID) num FROM FUN_DEAL A LEFT JOIN PROCESS_FINANC B ON B.COMP_ID = A.COMP_ID AND B.DEAL_ID = A.DEAL_ID WHERE B.PF_ACTUAL = 1 AND B.AUDIT_STATUS = 1 AND A.SIGN_DATE BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND A.COMP_ID = #{compId}
AND A.SIGN_SITE_DEPT IN
#{id} AND SIGN_SITE_GR IS NULL GROUP BY SIGN_SITE_DEPT,A.DEAL_TYPE ORDER BY SIGN_SITE_DEPT
AND A.SIGN_SITE_GR IN
#{id}
GROUP BY SIGN_SITE_GR,A.DEAL_TYPE ORDER BY SIGN_SITE_GR
